wirecard.description: You can pay with VISA or EuroCard/MasterCard. Your license serial number will be sent by email immediately.
wirecard.title: Credit/debit Card

fail.ohNoYourPaymentFailed: Oh no! Your recent payment has failed.
fail.pleaseRecheckOrChoose: Please re-check your card details or choose a different payment method.

paypal.description: To make your payment, you will need to log in to your Paypal account. Your license serial number will be sent by email immediately.
paypal.title: PayPal

redirectMessages.wirecard: We are going to redirect you to WireCard where you can finalize your payment securely.
redirectMessages.paypal: We are going to redirect you to PayPal where you can finalize your payment securely.
redirectMessages.wiretransfer: We are going to place you order. It will be finalized after we receiving your transfer.

wiretransfer.description: The order will be completed after your payment arrives to Kilgray's bank account. You will then receive your license serial number in email.
wiretransfer.title: Wire transfer
